meta.description: Calculate the maximum amount of data that can be transmitted from Station 0 to Station 8 in a network with specified capacities.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Data flow capacities between stations in terabytes per hour

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of data from one station to another in terabytes per hour

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from source to destination in terabytes per hour

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total flow from Station 0 to Station 8

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source station 0

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink station 8

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 1

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 2

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 3

constraints.name: flow_conservation_4
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 4

constraints.name: flow_conservation_5
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 5

constraints.name: flow_conservation_6
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 6

constraints.name: flow_conservation_7
constraints.description: Flow conservation at station 7
